meanings.sent1: When the baby skries, it means they are hungry.
meanings.sent2: I could hear the dog skries for help from far away.
meanings.sent3: The parrot skries so loudly that it wakes up the whole neighborhood.
meanings.sent4: Her skries of joy echoed through the entire room.
meanings.sent5: The thunder skries in the distance, announcing the coming storm.

meanings.definition: Skries (noun): a loud cry or shout
meanings.sent1: The skries of the child could be heard across the playground.
meanings.sent2: His skries of excitement filled the room with joy.
meanings.sent3: The skries of the seagulls added to the peacefulness of the beach.
meanings.sent4: The skries of the protesters could be heard from miles away.
meanings.sent5: The skries of the eagle pierced through the silence of the forest.
